name: Knossi-8-slots
description:
This game is a simple slot machine game for Pico-8. It is very minimalistic and was made in only 3 hours of work. 

Use the x-button to start a new game. Press x-button in a running game to spin the wheel.

Use the up and down key to lower or raise the multiplicator.

Game is playable in modern browsers and on modern mobile devices like iPhone and Android.

In the next version I will setup some more advanced win conditions. Currently only pairs and the tripples will win!

Features:

  • pairs
  • dripples
  • free spins
  • jackpott
  • punishment

A tribiut tomy favorite Twitch streamer Knossi
